game.name: Bomb Bowling 2
game.shortDescription: Bomb Bowling 2 is an indie puzzle game with physics. Kick the pins out of the screen using explosions!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bomb Bowling 2 is an indie puzzle game with physics. Kick the pins out of the screen using explosions!

reviewHighlights.text: Pretty relaxing game, it's short but cool if you want to chill out. Bomb Bowling 2 10/10 Heisen.
bought it for 39cents in Sale # Its a fun game where u have to time bomb explosions in the correct order to eliminate all pins from screen. would recc...
